        public boolean forceFlushCrashReportToServer(android.content.Context context)

      • uncaughtException

        public void uncaughtException(java.lang.Thread thread,
                     java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Function is called when application crashes. The function handles crash and throws crash to default crash handler so that crash can be handled by other services such as new relic or crashlytics.
